changes.impact: The term 'Licensed money-changing operators' was replaced with 'Licensed money services businesses,' expanding the scope of applicable institutions.
The issuance date was updated from '30 June 2020' to '15 April 2024,' reflecting the new version's effectiveness.
Specifies the requirement for identification and verification processes to include both individuals and legal persons, enhancing KYC comprehensiveness.
Introduces specific Board responsibilities related to ensuring satisfactory measures for legal persons, increasing accountability.
Updates verification methods for individuals to include advanced technologies and provides stronger guidance on ensuring document authenticity.
Introduces examples of verification methods for legal persons, expanding the tools available for compliance.
Details the scope and criteria for external independent assessments, enhancing transparency and accountability for e-KYC solutions.
Emphasizes the need for maintaining records of the e-KYC solution's performance, enhancing monitoring and compliance.
Clarifies that this document supersedes the previous e-KYC policy document dated 30 June 2020, ensuring clarity in regulatory updates.
